status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bifja","text":"Seed HEK293T cells into a 10cm tissue culture plate (6.1 million cells/plate), seeding one plate per construct you are generating virus for. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epf75","text":"Gently invert the tube 8 – 10 times to mix the precipitation solution and media together. Parafilm the tube and leave on a rocker gently rocking at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":148,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":154,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7gq7k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4iems","text":"If intending to infect cells with fresh virus, seed the cells to be infected into a 6 well plate (~220K cells/well).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ffr9l","text":"After the 48 hour rocking incubation, centrifuge the viral precipitation mix at   for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":80,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3s8hh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1600","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"40ieh","text":"Remove the supernatant, disposing of it into a beaker containing bleach. Resuspend the precipitated pellet in 3 – 6 mL of fresh growth media (3 mL if you require high construct expression). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2kqdb","text":"Replace the media on the cells to be infected with  fresh growth media/well. Add  of the precipitated virus to each well to be infected. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"tb91","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1upoe","text":"Add polybrene at a final concentration of 8 mg/mL to each well, and rock the plate to mix. Place the cells back into the incubator. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqt4q","text":"Any leftover virus can be frozen at   for use at a future date ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fu6fb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bh40a","text":"After 24 – 48h (depending on the construct and expression required), remove the media from the infected cells and place in bleach to dispose. Add fresh growth media back to the cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3fe42","text":"After 5 - 7 days after the virus has been removed (and after three passages), using FACS, sort the cells populations to the desired fluorescent expression level. \n   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50ol","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
